ValidationRule.description: Rate start date must be today if account is being provisioned initially
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", Provisioned__c, LEN(AccountNumber)<3, Rate_Start_Date__c <> TODAY() , RecordType.DeveloperName = "ReadyTalk_Account" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The rate start date must be changed to today when provisioning initially.
